name: Blended (cykelkatalogen)
description:
A 64*64 pixel resolution puzzle game. Memorize the goal and try to (re)-arrange the boxes so that the colors and position matches.

How to play
Select a level with mouse (or touch on phone). A level starts with a 5 second countdown which shows how you should arrange the boxes in order to complete the level. If you want to return to the level selection from a level drag a box outside of the game area.

Boxes can be dropped upon each other which might result in new colors. Some boxes can only be moved in certain ways.

Look at the colors and listen to the sounds and you'll succeed.
